markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghoran Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=3946) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 37</row>

</column>

---

The very first memories ghorans have are those of their creation, and even after thousands of years, those memories have never faded for you. You become trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) and [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Ghoran Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Ghoran Lore
